actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act with respect to the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to provide financial assistance for conservation measures providing drainage of land by means of open ditches.

summary.text: Amends the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide financial assistance for open-ditch land drainage measures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act with respect to the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to provide financial assistance for conservation measures providing drainage of land by means of open ditches.
